text: Kumar Valavhadas Pallana (23 December 1918 â€“ 10 October 2013) was an Indian- American actor, comedian and vaudevillian. He began his career as plate spinner and juggler on the Mickey Mouse Club. He was known for his role as Gupta in The Terminal (2004). Pallana was born in Indore, present-day Madhya Pradesh. Pallana died on 10 October 2013 in Oakland, California at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian stage actors Category:Indian voice actors Category:Indian comedians Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Vaudeville performers Category:Comedians from Oakland, California Category:Actors from Oakland, California Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
title: Kumar Pallana
